title: Clubs Not Showing?
body: I don't know if it's a bug or not, but ever since Riot have re-enabled clubs a while ago, my club haven't shown back up in the clubs tab and the tag doesn't show up by my name. However, when I ask my friends if I'm in the group or not, they have said I'm in the group. The worst part is, I'm the person who made the club so I can't get myself kicked. Has anybody else having this problem or am I the only one?

replies.body:
We've resolved most of the Clubs issues for club owners, but some are still lingering. If you reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll work with you to resolve this for good.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
I'd submitted a ticket and was basically told clubs are broken and they closed the ticket.  Wasn't very helpful and I still can't do anything with my club either.  :\
Also got this problem and now, eventhough I'm my club leader, I'm the only one that doesn't have the tag. S A D B O Y Z
